name: Michele
background: Michele is a rookie P.U.S investigator in the world of strinova. She is a gamer that applies her gaming to her job as a investigtor. Michele is guided by her seniors Kokona and Nobunaga. Michele loves cat and uses cat robots to fight the enemies, these are also known as Pawtector and Mighty Meow. She wishes to become a admired hero like her father who under unknown circumstances has fallen for collpase syndrome.

active.name: Pawtector
active.description: Michele depolys a Pawtector that can stick to any surfaces from a certain range. The Pawtector will automatically attack the enemy once they get into the range of the pawtector. The Pawtector will deactive once michele reaches a certain range away from it.
details: Cooldown starts when a pawtector is destroyed or when all is placed

passive.name: Kitty Tracer
passive.description: Allows her to see enemies that hits her with any weapon
details: The detectation only lasts for 2 minutes and can only be seen by Michele.

ultimate.name: Mighty MeowBlast
ultimate.description: Michele throws a powerful turret into the battlefield that auto-attacks nearby enemies
details: It can only attack one enemy at a time
Mighty Meowbot attacks in 2 phases. The first phase last around 1.25 seconds and deals 2 damage 15 times. The second phase involves a 0.1 charge time before doing 45 damage to the enemy
Mighty Meowbot can die in 2 ways. The first way is the moment that it is thrown, there is a 32 second countdown before it despawns. The second way is if it is destroy by enemy, Meowbot has 750hp.
Mighty Meowbot attack range is its line of sight, which allows it to attack from very far distances with a maximun range of 50 meters.

weapon.name: Inspector
weapon.description: Michele main gun, Inspector, has a maganize of 30 and damage based on the distance of the enemy is. This gun has a great balance of recoil, spread, and firing rate allowing it to be one of the best weapons in the game.
